enhanced_description: Elabram Systems, a division of Elabram Group, specializes in comprehensive human resources solutions, leveraging over 20 years of experience in HR consultancy. The company provides a wide range of services including HR Outsourcing for temporary staff and payroll services, Recruitment Solutions for permanent staff, expatriate providers, and Executive Search for middle to top-level candidates across various industries and non-profit organizations. They also offer digital human resources administration systems through Axdif. Elabram aims to reduce operational costs and save time for clients by handling HR-related activities, and assisting with the entire recruitment process from candidate hunting to onboarding. With a dedicated consultant approach, Elabram HR Solution targets the Southeast Asia market as a leading HR solutions provider and serves global businesses.
